remarks: The value of isomorphism H is a subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihlss.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihlss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihlss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlss.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihlss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( I ` X ) e. S ) $.
